content.newsInsight: Xi's military purges just hit China's nuclear forces and everyone's spooked about instability. Wrong read. When you clean house in your most sensitive division, you're not worried about today. You're positioning for something bigger.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: Xi's nuclear command purges, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: what capability gap did internal audits reveal that made immediate restructuring worth the international optics hit?
